title.rendered: SUPREMA BIOSTATION L2 FINGERPRINT IP ACCESS TERMINAL

content.rendered:
BioStation L2 converges the benefits of biometrics into time and attendance application. The use of true identity will lead to increased convenience and security to users and administrators.

Features

  • Biometric : Fingerprint / Live Finger Detection : Supported /
  • RF Options : BSL2-OM 13.56Mhz MIFARE MIFARE Plus, DESFire/EV1, FeliCa, NFC
  • CPU 1.2GHz Quad Core / Memory 256MB RAM + 2GB Flash / LCD 2.0″ Color LCD / Sound 16bit Hi-Fi
  • Operating Temp. -20° to 50°C / Power 12VDC / Dimensions 71x 201 x 44 (WxHxD mm) / Certificates CE, FCC, KC, RoHS, REACH, WEE
  • TCP/IP / RS-485 1ch Host or 1ch Slave (Selectable) / Wiegand 1ch In or Out (Selectable)
